metadata.title: CVE-2023-4459 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in vmxnet3_rq_cleanup indrivers/net/vmxnet3/vmxnet3_drv.c in the networking sub-component invmxnet3 in the Linux Kernel. This issue may allow a local attacker withnormal user privilege to cause a denial of service due to a missing sanitycheck during cleanup.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
